body.p:
Quartermaster's Department,
OFFICE RIVER TRANSPORTATION.
Louisville, Ky., May 11th 1864.
His Excellency Thos G Bramblett
Gov of the State of Kentucky

Your petitioner would respectfully ask that he be appointed a Notary Public" for the County of Jefferson, made necessary by the urgent demands of the business of the Office of River Transportation, to which he is attached, and also by the Removal of "E. R. Bissell" Notary Public from this office and County

Respectfully forwarded with the request that the appointment be made as it will facilitate the business of this office very much in the transactions of which, affidavits are continually required to be made
